Package farmSim

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
farmSim.GameState
public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
Game-state holds the information about the current state of the game.
Version:
2/05/2020
Author:
James Harris, Manjeet Panwar

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState​(int numOfDaysGameLasts, java.lang.String farmerName, java.lang.String farmName, java.lang.String farmType)
      Initializes the gameState. Creates new farm, and new farmer, using passed in inputs Sets the games duration based on numOfDaysGameLasts Initializes current day to zero, and actions left to 2 Gives the user the water item, which isn't removed on use
      Parameters:
      numOfDaysGameLasts - Number of days for game to last
      farmerName - The name of the farmer
      farmName - The name of the farm
      farmType - The type of the farm
